name: Chambord Kir Royale
preparation:
The Kir Royale is a swanky Champagne and black raspberry cocktail that is sure to class up your night. The subtle twist on the fruity French Kir Royale combines Champagne and black raspberry liqueur, rather than the traditional creme de cassis. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion or need a bubbly brunch drink, mix up this swanky recipe for the Kir Royale.

Add the Chambord to a flute and top with Champagne.

Garnish with a raspberry and a lemon twist.
